name: Feeding Felix
description: We made a game at summer scHool through the computEr gaming/coding course, we reaLly enjoyed ourselves and hoPe you can enjoy our small game. It's not the best, as this is just our headstart into the world of coding! This week was a lot of fUn, and we plan to make more gameS in the future. Whether they'll be uploaded here or not, we don't know! :-) E and F signing off - until the next time we're kept hostage!
